mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.goods_name AS goodsName,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.shop_id AS shopId,A.integral AS integral,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.user_id AS userId,A.module_id AS moduleId,A.cat_id AS catId,A.goods_sn AS goodsSn,A.shop_price AS shopPrice,A.give_integral AS giveIntegral,A.remain_number AS remainNumber,A.group_num AS groupNum,A.group_price AS groupPrice,A.group_json AS groupJson,A.time_num AS timeNum,A.pic_path AS picPath,A.pic_paths AS picPaths,A.warn_number AS warnNumber,A.goods_brief AS goodsBrief,A.goods_description AS goodsDescription,A.attr_conent1 AS attrConent1,A.attr_conent2 AS attrConent2,A.attr_conent3 AS attrConent3,A.attr_conent4 AS attrConent4,A.status_code AS statusCode,A.valid_start_time AS validStartTime,A.valid_end_time AS validEndTime,A.scans AS scans,A.hits AS hits,A.done_amount AS doneAmount,A.is_real AS isReal,A.is_new AS isNew,A.is_hot AS isHot,A.is_best AS isBest,A.is_on_sale AS isOnSale,A.keywords AS keywords,A.postage_fee AS postageFee,A.pack_fee AS packFee,A.is_seven_return AS isSevenReturn,A.goods_name_style AS goodsNameStyle,A.provider_id AS providerId,A.provider_name AS providerName,A.goods_weight AS goodsWeight,A.sync_flag AS syncFlag,A.brand_id AS brandId,A.market_price AS marketPrice,A.agent_price AS agentPrice,A.agent_vip_price AS agentVipPrice,A.promote_price AS promotePrice,A.auction_price AS auctionPrice,A.promote_start_date AS promoteStartDate,A.promote_end_date AS promoteEndDate,A.goods_thumb_id AS goodsThumbId,A.goods_img_id AS goodsImgId,A.original_img_id AS originalImgId,A.extension_code AS extensionCode,A.is_alone_sale AS isAloneSale,A.is_promote AS isPromote,A.bonus_type_id AS bonusTypeId,A.bonus AS bonus,A.goods_type_id AS goodsTypeId,A.seller_note AS sellerNote,A.is_public AS isPublic,A.goods_from AS goodsFrom,A.goods_privilege AS goodsPrivilege,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

if.test: priceFrom != null and priceFrom !='' and priceTo != null and priceTo !=''

sql.if: AND A.id NOT IN ( SELECT ag.goods_id FROM auction_goods ag LEFT JOIN auction_profession ap ON ap.id = ag.auction_id WHERE ap.serial = #{paramSerial})

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN dict d ON A.type_code = d.code LEFT JOIN shop s ON A.shop_id = s.id
mapper.update: update goods set main_status = #{mainStatus}, updated_at = NOW(), updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id IN(${goodsIds})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
